/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows that add depth to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings.
